name: Tartaglia
storytext: Should this table be considered a battlefield, then may the strongest claim the win.
source: Reward for inviting Tartaglia to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

skills.name: Foul Legacy: Raging Tide
skills.descriptionraw: Switches to <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112042]</color> and deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], and attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112043]</color> to the target character.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Switches to <color=#FFFFFFFF>Melee Stance</color> and deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>, and attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>Riptide</color> to the target character.
skills.description: Switches to Melee Stance and deals 2 Hydro DMG, and attach Riptide to the target character.

skills.name: Havoc: Obliteration
skills.descriptionraw: Performs different attacks based on the current stance that <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1204]</color> is in.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Ranged Stance - Flash of Havoc: </color>Deal $[D__KEY__DAMAGE_5] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], reclaim 2 $[K310], and apply <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112043]</color> to the target character.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Melee Stance - Light of Obliteration</color>: Deal $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT].
skills.descriptionreplaced: Performs different attacks based on the current stance that <color=#FFFFFFFF>Tartaglia</color> is in.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Ranged Stance - Flash of Havoc: </color>Deal 5 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>, reclaim 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>, and apply <color=#FFFFFFFF>Riptide</color> to the target character.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Melee Stance - Light of Obliteration</color>: Deal 7 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>.
skills.description:
Performs different attacks based on the current stance that Tartaglia is in.
Ranged Stance - Flash of Havoc: Deal 5 Hydro DMG, reclaim 2 Energy, and apply Riptide to the target character.
Melee Stance - Light of Obliteration: Deal 7 Hydro DMG.

skills.name: Tide Withholder
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112041]</color>. Once the <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112042]</color> attached to the character ends, reapplies <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112041]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>Ranged Stance</color>. Once the <color=#FFFFFFFF>Melee Stance</color> attached to the character ends, reapplies <color=#FFFFFFFF>Ranged Stance</color>.
skills.description: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains Ranged Stance. Once the Melee Stance attached to the character ends, reapplies Ranged Stance.
